category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMCN_release_statuses
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of mutually exclusive Release Statuses internal names that must be associated to a ChangeNoticeRevision associated to a Bill of Material (BOM) Window. There must be only one of these statuses on the ChangeNoticeRevision at any stage. The default values are "Pending" and "TCM Released". These could be replaced with appropriate values as per business needs: e.g.if using the cmtmes template, these could be replaced with "Mei0PendingRelease", "Mei0Released", "Mei0WorkInProgress".
